name: The Old Plough Folk & Acoustic Club

shows.title: Old Plough Folk & Acoustic Club
shows.desc: Nicky Coates and Chris Lawley tell us there's scientific evidence that singing and playing together is good for you, but we don’t need science to tell us that. The Old Plough is a safe and welcoming environment enabling young and old to perform songs, music and poetry of all styles – not just folk – to other Greenbelters.
